issue.title: Adjust 3d lidar post to match camera post (vary height based on z position)

content.raw: Currently the 3d lidar post is a fixed length and the post arm and lidar ‘slides’ up a down the post. This is okay, but the fixed post length is inappropriate if the z of the lidar is very different. We would like to change the post to match the camera post, which varies in length based on the z position of the lidar.
